Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters

Class ProfessorCharacter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters.Character
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters.ProfessorCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ProfessorCharacter extends Character
The class ProfessorCharacter is the class that represent the characters that modify the computation of the possession of the professor

      public ProfessorCharacter(int id, CharacterType type, String desc, String desc_short, int cost)

      id - is the id of the Character

      desc - is the description of the character
      desc_short - is the short version of the description of the character
      cost - is the cost to use the power of the character

      public Rule usePower(Player player) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method modify the model with the changed needed to use the power of the card
      Specified by:
      usePower in class Character
      Parameters:
      player - is the player that use the character card
      Returns:
      an object Rule containing the rule modified by the effect of the card
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - when the player doesn't have enough money to use the character card
